text: Kelly Plitz (born 31 October 1957) is a Canadian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. Her husband Ian Roberts is also an Olympic equestrian, while their son Waylon is a two-time Pan American Games medalist in equestrian. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ajax, Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Ontario
title: Kelly Plitz
